attributes.review: Im honestly disappointed.  Upon opening this app, I was bombarded by numerous pop ups asking me if I wanted to enable notifications. I repetitively declined but was forced to hit accept in the end. I donâ€™t know if this is a coincidence but that has never happened in any app I have downloaded.  Apart from that, the app itself is supporting a fascist, a more than potential rapist, and a bigot, accused of multiple impeachable offenses yet he is still in office.  To paraphrase the intercept.com, Racism, bigotry, and white nationalism are all in fact impeachable offenses.  I would just list every act of incompetence seen in Trump during his presidency, but all of that is so easy to find considering that it happens so frequently and that so much dirt on Trump isnâ€™t in need of â€œdiggingâ€, as it is already building up on the surface.  It is disappointing how easy it is to find something Trump has done wrong within the last 24 hours.  In fact, searching his name alone shows reports of him â€œraging over supreme courts decision involving his financial recordsâ€ or â€œthreatening to cut funding if schools do not fully reopenâ€.  And if that is who we are supporting in this app then I donâ€™t believe it deserves any more than 1 star.
